casebody.data:
[Carroll,

December, 1882.] Wardwell & a. v. Tamworth. Petition for a highway in the defendant town. D. H. Hill and E. A. Hibbard, for the petitioners. tS. E. Quarles, for the defendants. Blodgett, J.

The petition was referred to the county commissioners, who reported in favor of the petitioners. The defendants moved to reject the report; but the court denied the motion, and the defendants excepted.

Exceptions overruled.

Smith, J., did not sit: the others concurred.
